chapters.title: Chapter 1: To Keep the Bargain
chapters.info: Reanne Corly, p. 57 (51)—Eldest of the Knitting Circle, the ruling group among the women known as the Kin. She has blue eyes, and is quite strong in the One Power; she could match Sheriam, Kwamesa, or Kiruna. She claims to be 412 years old. Publicly, she arranges shipping for small traders.
